meanings.definition: The state of being gifted or possessing exceptional talent or ability.
meanings.sent1: Her giftednesses in music were evident from a young age.
meanings.sent2: The school celebrated the students' various giftednesses in art and science.
meanings.sent3: His giftednesses in soccer made him the star player of the team.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with the giftednesses of colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The giftednesses of her storytelling captivated the audience.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of having natural talent or intelligence.
meanings.sent1: The giftednesses of the young artist were truly remarkable.
meanings.sent2: She displayed her giftednesses in problem-solving during the competition.
meanings.sent3: The cat's giftednesses in catching mice saved the day.
meanings.sent4: The forest whispered with the giftednesses of ancient trees.
meanings.sent5: His giftednesses in mathematics were unmatched in the class.
